title: Demi Lovato Previews Action-Packed 'Confident' Music Video
text:
Comments The singer takes on the bad guys in one of the sneak-peeks she shared before releasing the video in full on October 9. 
Demi Lovato is getting ready to drop the official music video for her new single "Confident". Ahead of its Friday, October 9 release, the singer let fans take a peek into the upcoming visuals via some teaser clips shared over the weekend. In one preview she unveiled on her own Twitter page, she looks fierce in a black tank top while sporting messy hair. Another snippet arriving through Marriott Rewards' Twitter account offers glimpses at the 23-year-old singer as she takes down some bad guys. — Demi Lovato (@ddlovato) October 3, 2015 Watch our exclusive sneak-peek of @ddlovato 's #CONFIDENT . Itâ��s premiering only with us on 10/9. #NowThatsRewarding https://t.co/NzClAYjwRu — Marriott Rewards (@MarriottRewards) October 4, 2015 For her new music video, Lovato has hired famed director Robert Rodriguez and Michelle Rodriguez . "So honored to be working w these 2 badasses: the legendary director @Rodriguez & the legendary actress @MRodOfficial!" she said of the filmmaker and the " Furious 7 " star in a Twitter post when announcing their involvement last week. "I was so impressed by Demi's fearless performance as a guest star on my TV series ' From Dusk Till Dawn ' that I jumped at the chance to direct her video. I basically treated this like we were shooting a high octane action film, because she has the presence and star power to pull it off. She's incredible," director Rodriguez praised Lovato in a statement. "Confident" serves as the second single and the title track of Lovato's new album, which is due out on October 16.
